name: Juggernauts
detailed_description: Juggernauts is a fast-paced, action-packed and team-based game. You will control a futuristic hovercraft trying to be the first to find the Golden Orb. If the Golden Orb is not found within the time limit, the team with the most points wins. Points are earned by collecting White Orbs which you return to your teams portal. Be careful though, you don't want to let the other team steal your orbs!
